Remember to configure in obamp.cfg
your IP address and your operating system

<local_address>     
<Operative_System>

Use only Linux or Windows (warning they are case sensitive)

obamp_nodes.txt contains the list of IP addresses that are
partecipating at the OBAMP network

THIS FILE MUST BE THE SAME ON EVERY MACHINE
THE SAME ORDER OF THE IP ADDRESSES MUST BE KEPT
